overview: 27 floors, 10,000 residents*: The world-famous residential park Alterlaa in Vienna is considered an iconic monument of social utopia. In 27 STOREYS, director Bianca Gleissinger goes back to the place of her childhood, traces the young and old residents of this biotope with a great deal of humor and self-irony, and puts the architect's former promise of happiness to the test.
title: 27 Storeys
